125646.「教団の調査員たちが 手も足も出ないくらい \n 次の領界も 過酷な場所なのでし:
Is this next realm so harsh that not even the
Order can make their way through...?
Liberator, please be our guide.

125647.「さあ 水の領界へ まいりましょう。: Okay, let's go to the Water Realm.

125648.「これが 水の領界…………。: So this is the Water Realm...

125649.「水が……うねりながら 流れてゆく……。\n これが 教団が所蔵する文献に書かれ:
So much water, swirling and flowing around...
Is this what the books of the Order refer to
as "the sea"?

125650.「私の故郷の 炎の領界では考えられません。\n 皆へのおみやげに 持って帰れない:
Such a thing is unheard of in the Fire Realm.
I wonder if I could bring some of it back as
a souvenir for everyone!

125651.「すみません 私としたことが。 \n 今は 領界をつなぐ使命が 最優先でしたね。:
Sorry, I got a little carried away. Connecting
the realms is still the top priority. As for
those from the Order who got here first...

125652.「お前たちは いったい いつまで\n しょっぱい水の上で 足止めを食らわす気だ！:
How long were you planning on leaving us stuck
here in this sea of salt?!

125653.「ももも 申し訳ございません！ \n あれに見えるのが 次なる聖塔なのは\n 間:
O-o-our apologies! We think that structure
just ahead is most definitely the tower!

125654.「あの塔より 激しい高波が発生しており！\n 我らの船では 近づくことは おろか:
The waves surrounding it are incredibly
strong! Our ships can't get close, let alone
sail through them!

125655.「さらに 塔に近づけば 暴風がうず巻き \n たとえ竜の翼でも 降りたつことは困:
Furthermore, there's a raging storm covering
the tower! Landing would be difficult even
with wings!

125656.「予測では この島にある 水柱に囲まれた\n ほこらに 先に進むための 手がかり:
I believe there are some clues on how to
proceed through that shrine that is surrounded
by pillars of water...

125657.「わたくしの持つ知識を 総動員しましても\n いまだ 謎を解明できずでして……ハ:
However, even with all my knowledge, I still
haven't been able to crack it...

125659.「トビアス。気持ちは わかりますが \n がんばってくださっている この方たちに:
I understand your frustration, Tobias... but
don't take your anger out on them. They're
all doing the best they can.

125661.「うっ エステラ……！ それに 解放者さま！: E... Estella! And the liberator, too!

125662.「も…申し訳ございません 解放者さま。\n 領界の調査が 少々 難航しており\n:
M...my apologies, liberator. We seem to have
some difficulty in investigating this place
and can't discern how to get to the tower.

125663.「しかし 今しばらく お待ちいただければ \n 必ず 道を開きますので……！:
But, if you can just bear with us, we'll
surely open the way for you!

125664.「……トビアス。\n 今は 領界をつなぐために 協力すべき時です。:
Tobias... we must cooperate if we want to
connect the realms together.

125665.「おチカラを貸していただけますか 解放者さま。: You will help us again, won't you?

125666.「解放者さまが……そうおっしゃるならば。 \n 見てのとおり 我々は この島から:
If the liberator says so, then so be it. As
you're aware, we're looking for a way to get
from this island to the tower.

125667.「そこの教団員の 調査によって\n どうやら むこうに見えるほこらに\n 道を開:
Through their investigation, we learned that
the shrine over there might hold some clues
on how to progress forward.

125668.「解放者さまの知恵を お借りできるなら\n どうか ほこらの調査に協力していただ:
If we could borrow your knowledge, we'd like
to ask you to help us investigate that
shrine.

125669.「ええ。解放者さまと チカラを合わせれば\n きっと 道は開かれるでしょう。:
Right. If we work together with the liberator,
I've no doubt we'll find the way forward.

125670.「では <pc>さん。 \n ひとつ 調査と まいりましょうか。:
Come on, <pc>. Let's investigate
that shrine, shall we?

125671.「水の壁が 消えている……。\n <pc>さんなら きっと\n 道を開いてくださ:
The watery wall is disappearing... I knew that
you'd find the way ahead!

125672.「まさか……ほこらの謎を 解いたのか！？:
Unbelievable... you solved the shrine's
mystery?!

125674.「さすが 解放者さま。お見それいたしました。 \n ふがいない自分を 悔しく思い:
I should've expected nothing less from the
liberator. I apologize for my rudeness and my
incompetence.

125676.「もしかしたら……これが 聖塔へ向かう\n 手段なのかしら……。: The way of getting to the tower, perhaps...?

125677.「恐れずにまいりましょう <pc>さん。\n ……それに トビアスも。:
We can't let fear stop us. Come on, you two.
Let's go.

125678.「オマケみたいな扱いは やめてもらえるか？:
Do you really have to treat us like we're
stragglers?

125683.「ここ 息ができるみたい……。\n 声も普通に 聞こえますね。:
It seems we can breathe here... and our voices
can be heard normally.

125685.「それなら 何も恐れることはないッ。\n 一刻も早く 塔を目指しましょう！:
Then there's nothing to be afraid of! Let's
head for the tower!

125686.「なんだか 穏やかな領界ですね。\n 目に映る景色が とても色あざやかで……。:
What a peaceful realm this is. The scenery
is so vivid and full of colors...

125688.「この身より……血より……感謝を捧げます……。:
Beyond this body... beyond our blood... we
offer our gratitude...

125689.「我らの喜び……我らの支え……\n ゆいいつの救い……白きイルカよ…………。:
Our joy, our support... our only salvation...
O great white dolphin...

125693.「おお 海中が 空気で満たされていく……。: Ah... I can feel the sea filling with air...

125694.「ぼくたちの 命のみなもと……。\n カシャルさまの恵みに 感謝を……。:
Our lives continue on because of the blessings
of the great Kashal... we offer our sincere
gratitude...

125695.「我ら ルシュカの民は いつ いかなる時も \n 神獣カシャルさまと ともにある:
We, people of Ruska, shall forever and always
be one with the great divine beast, Kashal!

125698.「すこし 圧倒されてしまいましたが…… \n 次の領界への道を開き 竜族を救うと:
That was a bit unexpected, but... our mission
remains the same. Find the way to the next
realm to save all Nadravians.

125699.「あの大きな建物の裏手に 聖塔が見えています。\n さっそく 塔へ 向かってみま:
You can see the tower behind that large
structure. Let's make our way there.

125701.「聖塔への道が 閉ざされていましたので \n こちらの 水の領界の方々に\n ご:
The way to the tower is closed, so we are
asking this realm's citizens for help.

125702.「私は 神官エステラ……。 \n 遠き炎の領界より ナドラガ教団の使いとして\n:
I am priestess Estella, an emissary of the
Nadraga Order. I have traveled from the
distant Fire Realm to get here.

125703.「こちらは ナドラガンドが待ちわびた\n 解放者……<pc>さまです。:
And this is Nadragand's long awaited
liberator...<pc>.

125704.「我々は 総主教オルストフさまの指揮のもと\n 竜族の神ナドラガを 復活させ\n:
Under Patriarch Orstov's leadership, we are
trying to revive the dragon god, Nadraga,
and save all of Nadragand.

125705.「名高き巫女さまと お見受けしてお願いします。\n どうか 領界をつなぐ\n 手:
Given your status as a renowned maiden,
would you help us connect the realms?

125707.「こちらにおられる フィナさまは\n 神獣カシャルの巫女として\n 神秘のサンゴ:
Our esteemed Lady Fina is the maiden of the
divine beast Kashal, and protects the Mystical
Coral with utmost importance.

125708.「そして 我は この領界を守護する\n 青の騎士団の長 ディカス……。:
I'm Dicus, head of the Blue Brigade, and
protector of this realm...

125710.「お声の出せない フィナさまに代わって告げる。: I speak on behalf of Fina because she is mute.

125711.「異教の者よ……。\n 今すぐ この領界から 立ち去られよ！: Heretics... leave this realm at once!

125715.「この領界では 救いの白きイルカ\n 神獣カシャルさまを あがめている……。:
In this realm, we revere our savior, the
divine beast Kashal...

125716.「我らの伝承では 竜の神は\n 世に嘆きをもたらすと 伝わっておるぞ。:
Our traditions say that Nadraga brings only
grief and misery to this world.

125717.「そのような わざわいの神を \n 復活させようと 企む輩……\n たしか オル:
And you said that someone plans to revive that
fiendish god... Orstov, was it?

125720.「ナドラガ神だけでなく\n オルストフさまを 侮辱するとは！\n ……許さん！:
How dare you insult not only Nadraga, but also
Orstov! I will not allow it!

125721.「我々の肩には 竜の民の未来がかかっている！ \n チカラずくでも 通してもらう:
The future of all Nadravians depends on our
success! Whatever it takes, we WILL make you
see!

125722.「…………熱くなってんじゃねえ。: ...No need to get all flustered now.

125723.「あんた ケンカ売りに来たわけじゃねえんだろ？:
You didn't come here to start a fight, did
you?

125729.「こちらは フィナさま直属の騎士\n ……ヒューザ殿だ。: This is Hyuza, a knight who serves under Fina.

125732.「ですが お願いです！ どうか 話を……: But please! Please, you must listen...

125733.「そなたが信ずる神を 軽んじたことは詫びよう。\n だが そなたたちとは相容れぬ:
I apologize for disrespecting the god you
worship, but I cannot agree with your beliefs.

125736.「わ……悪かったな。交渉を 決裂させて。: I...I'm sorry. I ruined your negotiation.

125738.「あなたが オルストフさまのことを \n 深く敬愛しているのは よくわかっていま:
I'm well aware of your deep admiration
for Orstov.

125739.「<pc>さん……。\n せっかく 同席していただいたのに\n 残念な結果になっ:
<pc>... I am sorry that this meeting
didn't go as planned after coming all this
way.

125740.「しかし あきらめるわけにはいきません。: But we cannot let this falter us.

125742.「あの不思議な巫女……フィナさんには \n 何か底知れぬチカラが 秘められていそ:
Fina, that mysterious maiden... she exuded
a powerful presence that hints at an
unfathomable hidden power...

125743.「あの方たちを 説得するためにも\n 私たちは 水の領界のことを もっと\n よ:
In order to convince them to help us, we'll
need to learn more about the Water Realm.

125745.「そういえば あいつら この領界では\n ナドラガ神ではなく 白いイルカを\n:
Come to think of it... didn't they mention
that they worship a white dolphin here
instead of Nadraga?

125746.「そうですね……。\n たしか 神獣カシャルさまだったかしら。\n 彼らとわかり:
That's right... the divine beast Kashal I
believe it was called. That could be a clue on
better understanding their ways.

125747.「きっと この町を調べていけば\n その白いイルカについて 何かわかるはずです。:
If we investigate this town, I'm certain we
can find some information about Kashal.
Let's split up and start the search!

125748.「……お若いの 花束を ありがとうよ。: Thank you for the bouquet, young one.

125749.「あんた ウワサになってるよ。 \n この海底の町に またも 外界の……\n そ:
You have been the talk of the town recently.
They say an outsider of a different race has
yet again come to this place...

125750.「わしの一族は 先祖代々 墓守をしとる。\n この墓碑は ずっとずっと昔……\n:
My family has been guarding this grave for
generations. This tombstone was built a
long time ago... back when Ruska sank.

125751.「神代の昔のこと……\n 我らの世界 ナドラガンドに 災厄があり\n 天地が５つ:
In ancient times, there was a calamity here
in Nadragand... causing it to be divided into
five pieces.

125752.「このルシュカは 巨大な海洋都市だったが \n 一夜にして……海に没した。\n:
Ruska was once a great port city, but
overnight... it sunk into the sea.
Our ancestors were doomed to die.

125753.「その時 神獣カシャルさまは現れた……。:
That's when Kashal, the divine beast,
appeared...

125754.「カシャルさまは ほれ……上の広場にある\n 神秘のサンゴを使って 海中を空気で:
You see, the great Kashal used the Mystical
Coral in the upper plaza to fill the sea with
air to breathe, thus saving our ancestors.

125755.「おかげで この領界に出た 犠牲者は \n ルシュカの姫 ただひとりじゃった……:
Thanks to her, Ruska's princess was the only
casualty...

125756.「姫は 深き海底にすむ カシャルさまのもとへ \n 泳ぎ着くと ルシュカの民を:
The princess swam to the ocean floor to meet
with Kashal. With her last breath, she asked
her to save Ruska's people.

125757.「その姫の死を いたんで\n この墓碑は 建てられたということじゃよ。:
It is said that this tombstone was erected to
mourn the princess' death.

125758.「お前 解放者なんて 呼ばれてんのかよ？: So they call you a liberator now, huh?

125760.「相変わらず お人よしだな <pc>。\n お前の おせっかい病には同情するぜ。:
<pc>, always the helpful one...
I can't help but feel sorry for
how easy you can trust people.

125761.「<pc>。\n あいつらを見限って 青の騎士団に来いよ。:
You should ditch them and come to the Blue
Brigade instead, <pc>.

125762.「……なんて顔してんだよ。\n お前が そんなに器用じゃねえってのは\n わかっ:
Come on, what's with the look? I know you're
not really all that skillful, but...

125763.「海の底の暮らしも 慣れれば悪くはねえよ。\n 静かで 時が止まったような……\:
Life down here isn't really all that bad once
you get used to it. It's quiet, like time just
stopped... it's like my home away from home.

125764.「……それに これでも お前には感謝してんだ。 \n こんな海の底まで オレを探:
Despite that... I am grateful. You came all
the way at the bottom of the sea to find me,
right? Actually, since then...

125766.「こいつなら オレのツレだから問題ねえよ。: Don't worry, that's just a friend of mine.

125767.「それでは……失礼します。\n 例によって フィナさまが……:
Very well. I shall take my leave. As usual,
Lady Fina is...

125768.「はァ？ またかよ あいつ……。うぜえ。: Huh, again?! She can be so... annoying.

125769.「どうせ いつもの場所だろうが\n 今日は……様子が おかしかったな。:
I'm sure I'll find her at the usual place,
but... she was acting strange today.

125770.「それに 近頃 あの辺りでは\n 凶悪な魔物の出現も 報告されています。:
There have also been reports of vicious
monsters in the area recently.

125772.「<pc>。\n ちょいと オレに付き合えよ。:
Hey <pc>. Come hang out with me
for a bit.

125773.「フラフラ巫女を 迎えにいくついでに……\n お前に 話したいこともあるしな。:
While on the way to find that muddled maiden,
there's something I need to tell you.

125774.「そんなわけで フィナの捜索を手伝ってくれ。\n あいつは この町を出て 南西に:
So, I'll need you to help me find her. She
probably left town and went to the Gaios
Sea to the southwest.

125775.「ひとまず ガイオス古海の奥を目指すぜ。: For now, let's just make our way there.

125776.「では……そちらのことは おまかせします。\n どうか お気をつけて。:
I see... Then I shall leave you to it.
Please be careful.

125777.「すこし 空気が薄くなってきたか……？\n 神秘のサンゴからも だいぶ離れたしな:
Does the air feel thinner to you...? We've
gotten pretty far from that Mystical Coral.

125778.「ここらで 休憩でもするか。: Let's stop here for a minute.

125779.「……ワケがわからねえって 顔してんな。: I can tell that something's bothering you...

125780.「まあ お前から見れば ヴェリナードで\n さらわれたヤツが こんな へんぴな場:
Man... I guess it must be pretty wild for you
to see me become a knight after everything
that happened in Verinard, kidnapping and all.

125781.「別に あいつの騎士なんて\n やりたくてやってるわけじゃねえけど。:
I didn't become her knight because I wanted
to, you know.

125783.「さらわれた後のことは あまり覚えてねえんだ。\n オレが 連れてこられたのが\:
I don't really remember too much after I was
kidnapped, but I'm pretty sure I was brought
here to this realm...

125784.「無我夢中で 逃げだした時には\n みっともねえが 全身ズタボロだったからな。:
I ran away in a frenzy and my body was in
shambles. It was pretty pathetic to see.

125785.「意識が はっきりしやがらねえまま……\n 気づいたら オレは 海の底で倒れてた:
I was unconscious... and when I woke up,
I was lying at the bottom of the sea.

125786.「そう ちょうど この辺りだったか……。: Yeah, it was right around here...

125787.「遠くの海面で 光が うるせえくらい \n またたいてんのを かすんだ目で見上げ:
My eyes were blurry, and I looked up and saw
an annoyingly bright light shining on
the sea's surface.

125788.「……ここで 死ぬんだなって わかったよ。: ...I knew I was as good as dead here.

125789.「そのとき 声が聞こえた……。: But then, I heard a voice...

125790.「かすかな声……女の声だ。\n 二度目は はっきりと 聞こえた。:
A faint voice... a woman's voice. The second
time she spoke, I heard it clearly.

125792.「それができるんなら 苦労しねえよって \n 腹立ててたら キズがみるみるうちに:
"If I could do that, I wouldn't be down here!"
I said angrily, but then my wounds suddenly
healed...

125793.「視界が戻ってきて 目の前にいるヤツを見た。\n ……生気のない瞳をした 女だっ:
When I could see clearly again, I saw her
right in front of me... a woman with lifeless
eyes.

125795.「あいつは 声が出せないらしいんだが \n なぜか迷惑なことに オレには聞こえる:
She can't speak, but for some annoying reason,
I can hear her just fine.

125796.「だいたい そんなところが\n 専属騎士とやらに なった経緯だ。 \n ……納得:
And that's the story of how I became her
knight in shining armor.
...Did you get all that?<yesno><close>

125797.「ふん。まあいいぜ どうでもいい話だ。:
Hmph... well, whatever. It's not important
anyways.

125798.「あいつは いつも言ってやがった。\n 私は 変わらないこの町を愛してる……って:
She always said, "I love that this town never
changes."

125799.「だが お前が ナドラガ教団とかいう連中と\n 一緒に現れた時 無表情なフィナが:
But when you came with your Nadraga Order or
whatever you call it, her face changed...
...and her face never changes.

125800.「……何にも勝る 絶望って顔だったぜ。:
I've never seen someone's face look so
distressed before.

125801.「さて 話し込んじまったけど\n あいつを 探さないとな。\n この奥に……いる:
Well, now that I've told you everything... we
need to find her. Pretty sure she's in there
somewhere.

125803.「邪悪ナル意志サマノ ゴ命令……\n カシャルノ巫女ニ ワザワイヲォォォ！！\n:
By the Evil Will's command... woe to the
maiden of Kashal!!! Gyuk gyuk gyuk!

125804.「キメェ顔で 笑いやがって。\n たとえ 押し付けられた騎士だろうが 目の前で\:
You sure are laughing with a smug face, huh... Well, even if I don't like this knight thing, I can't just go letting you beat on my
employer like that.

125806.「一緒に戦ってくれって 言ってんだよ。 \n 後れを 取んじゃねえぞ！:
Come on, we're doing this together. No
slacking off!

125807.「なに 油断してんだよ！ \n いいから 早く戻ってこい！:
I told you not to slack off! Just get the hell
over here!

125818.「ったく 面倒かけやがって……。: Jeez, you really are a pain...

125819.「この高熱……病気なのか？: A high fever... are you sick?

125822.「こちらのヒューザさんが <pc>さんの\n 探しておられた仲間の ひとりだった:
I see that Hyuza here was one of the friends
that you were searching for. I apologize that
I didn't realize sooner...

125823.「フィナさんが 倒れたと聞いて……: I heard that Fina had collapsed...

125825.「体内の魔力を 奪われつづけている……。\n 私にできるのは ほんのすこし 症状:
Her magical power continues to be drained from
within... All I can do is just alleviate the
symptoms a little... I'm sorry...

125826.「先の 闇の領界にて ナダイアさまから\n 己の立場と使命を 自覚せよと\n 諭:
Back in the Dark Realm, Nadaia warned me to
be aware of my place and my mission...

125827.「私は どうしても 目の前で苦しむ人を\n 見過ごせないようです……。:
But I can't just walk away when there's
people suffering...

125828.「やあ <pc>。\n がんばっているようですね。:
Greetings, <pc>.
Looks like you're doing the best you can.

130972.「……あなたがたに 水の領界の神話を\n お話ししましょう。:

Realm...

130976.「姫は 最期の願いを言いました。 \n 今まさに ルシュカは沈もうとしている。\:

130979.「マリーヌ神は おっしゃいました。\n ナドラガンドの未来は 竜の民たちが\n:

130980.「それを 支えるのは構わぬが\n 彼らの意思を 左右せぬよう\n お前から 声を:

130981.「そして いつしか竜の民の罪が許される日まで\n 幾星霜かかろうと 聖塔を守り続:

130992.「ありがとう 心優しき者たちよ……。\n どうか お願いします。:
